channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My late husband’s employer is forcing me to take 10% 401(k) distributions. Help!
item.description: “A company representative said the account needed to be emptied within a 10-year period.”

item.title: ‘She lives alone’: My mother-in-law, 86, gets $1,300 in Social Security. Is that enough to live on?
item.description: “We provide housing for her and send her a couple of hundred dollars a month.”

item.title: Harvard’s endowment could shrink as much as 40% from White House policies, analysis finds
item.description: Harvard University’s endowment could shrink by a dramatic 40% compared to what it would have been due to Trump administration policies.

item.title: High tariffs drive China imports down to a 16-year low. But U.S. trade deficits are still as big as ever.
item.description: High tariffs on China-made products drove U.S. imports from the world’s second-largest economy to a 16-year low in June — yet the dramatic shift hasn’...

item.title: ‘I feel shaken’: A man offered $50 to powerwash my patio. He would not take ‘no’ for an answer.
item.description: I wasn’t interested. I told him, “No thanks.” That didn’t work.

item.title: Anthropic’s new Claude 4.1 dominates coding tests days before GPT-5 arrives
item.description: Anthropic's Claude Opus 4.1 achieves 74.5% on coding benchmarks, leading the AI market, but faces risk as nearly half its $3.1B API revenue depends on...

item.title: LimX Dynamics launches LimX Oli full-size humanoid robot

item.title: Cosmic and ABB use robotics to rebuild LA homes after wildfires
item.description: Cosmic Buildings and ABB Robotics are deploying AI-powered microfactories in Pacific Palisades, Calif., to build modular structures onsite. The post C...

item.title: OpenAI returns to open source roots with new models gpt-oss-120b and gpt-oss-20b
item.description: Enterprises can use a powerful, near topline OpenAI LLM on their hardware totally privately and securely, without sending data to the cloud.

item.title: Agility Robotics, Boston Dynamics see leadership changes

item.title: A glimpse into OpenAI’s largest ambitions

item.title: OpenAI has finally released open-weight language models
item.description: OpenAI has finally released its first open-weight large language models since 2019’s GPT-2. These new “gpt-oss” models are available in two different ...

item.title: Qwen-Image is a powerful, open source new AI image generator with support for embedded text in English & Chinese
item.description: My initial tests revealed the text and prompt adherence was not noticeably better than Midjourney, the popular proprietary AI image generator

item.title: ChatGPT rockets to 700M weekly users ahead of GPT-5 launch with reasoning superpowers
item.description: ChatGPT reaches 700 million weekly users as OpenAI prepares to launch GPT-5 with integrated reasoning capabilities in August 2025.

item.title: Why tomorrow’s best devs won’t just code — they’ll curate, coordinate and command AI
item.description: AI coding requires a serious structural change. Where does that leave entry-level developers and the software industry as a whole?
